commit_push.template:
commit and push (1 or more logical commits)

Analyze the current changes and create logical, well-structured commits with descriptive messages. Group related changes together and push all commits to the remote repository.
commit_push.description: Create logical commits and push to remote

jj_pr.template:
Create a jj bookmark and GitHub PR for current working copy

Follow these steps:
1. Run `jj status` to check current state
2. Handle bookmarks:
   - Run `jj bookmark list` to see existing bookmarks
   - If a bookmark already exists for this work, use `jj bookmark set existing-bookmark-name` to set it to current commit
   - If no appropriate bookmark exists, create new one with `jj bookmark create feature/descriptive-name`
3. Push to GitHub with `jj git push --bookmark your-bookmark-name --allow-new`
4. Create PR with `gh pr create --head your-bookmark-name --base master --title "Your descriptive title" --body "Detailed description"`

Use descriptive bookmark names like feature/add-user-auth, fix/memory-leak, docs/api-guide. The working copy changes are automatically included when you create or set a bookmark. Always specify --head and --base explicitly when using gh pr create.
jj_pr.description: Push jj working copy to branch and create GitHub PR
